data.title: Photosynthetic plasticity of populations of Heliotropium curassavicum L. originating from differing thermal regimes
data.meta_description: Plants of the widely distributed species Heliotropium curassavicum L. have a large photosynthetic acclimation potential to temperature. There are, however,
